<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using bilingual dictionaries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden der zweisprachigen Verzeichnisse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation des dictionnaires bilingues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando dicionários bilíngües</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando i dizionari bilingue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση των δίγλωσσων λεξικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar los diccionarios bilingües</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson focuses on learning to use a bilingual dictionary while acquiring first and second language vocabulary about language and grammar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion konzentriert auf das Lernen, ein 
zweisprachiges Verzeichnis, beim zuerst erwerben und zweiten 
Sprachenwortschatz über Sprache und Grammatik zu verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon se concentre sur apprendre à utiliser
un dictionnaire bilingue tout en saisissant d'abord et le deuxième 
vocabulaire de langage au sujet du langage et de la grammaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição focaliza na aprendizagem usar um 
dicionário bilíngüe ao adquirir primeiramente e o segundo 
vocabulário da língua sobre a língua e a gramática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione mette a fuoco sull'imparare usare un
dizionario bilingue mentre acquista in primo luogo ed il secondo 
vocabolario di linguaggio circa il linguaggio e la grammatica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εστιάζει στην εκμάθηση να 
χρησιμοποιείται ένα δίγλωσσο λεξικό αποκτώντας πρώτα και το 
δεύτερο γλωσσικό λεξιλόγιο για τη γλώσσα και τη γραμματική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se centra en aprender utilizar un 
diccionario bilingüe mientras que adquiere primero y el segundo 
vocabulario del lenguaje sobre lenguaje y la gramática.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
